reachabilityStatus.description: Device reachability status as Reachable / Unreachable

tag.description: Tag ID that is associated with the device

cliStatus.description: CLI status at the time of discovery

lastUpdated.description: Time when the network device info last got updated

numUpdates.description: Number of time network-device info got updated

lineCardId.description: IDs of linecards of the device

pingStatus.description: Ping status at the time of discovery

tagCount.description: Number of tags associated with the device

location.description: Location ID that is associated with the device

upTime.description: Time that shows for how long the device has been up

snmpStatus.description: SNMP status at the time of discovery

type.description: Type of device as switch, router, wireless lan controller, accesspoints

avgUpdateFrequency.description: Frequency in which interface info gets updated

lineCardCount.description: Number of linecards on the device

family.description: Family of device as switch, router, wireless lan controller, accesspoints

duplicateDeviceId.description: Identifier of the duplicate ip of the same device discovered

role.description: Role of device as access, distribution, border router, core

interfaceCount.description: Number of interfaces on the device

discoveryStatus.description: Available options are: active, inactive, edit

passwordList.description: Password of the devices to be discovered

deviceIds.description: Ids of the devices discovered in a discovery

snmpRwCommunity.description: Snmp RW community of the devices to be discovered

discoveryCondition.description: To indicate the discovery status. Available options: Complete or In Progress

cdpLevel.description: CDP level to which neighbor devices to be discovered

userNameList.description: Username of the devices to be discovered

enablePasswordList.description: Enable Password of the devices to be discovered

ipAddressList.description: Ip address of the device to be discovered

isAutoCdp.description: Flag to mention if CDP discovery or not

ipFilterList.description: IP addresses of the devices to be filtered

numDevices.description: Number of devices discovered in a discovery

parentDiscoveryId.description: Parent Discovery Id from which the discovery initiated

retryCount.description: Number of times to try establishing connection to device

discoveryType.description: Available types are: single, auto cdp discovery, range, multi range

snmpRoCommunity.description: Snmp RO community of the devices to be discovered

protocolOrder.description: Order of protocol in which device connection establishment to be tried

globalCredentialIdList.description: To get the list of global credential of the discovery

timeOut.description: Time to wait for device response.

inventoryReachabilityStatus.description: Last known reachabilty status of the device

cliStatus.description: CLI status for the IP during this job run

passwordList.description: Password of the devices to be discovered

snmpAuthProtocol.description: SNMP auth protocol. Available values:'SHA' or 'MD5'

enablePasswordList.description: Enable Password of the devices to be discovered

retry.description: Number of times to try establishing connection to device

reDiscovery.description: Flag to indicate is rediscovery or not

protocolOrder.description: Order of protocol in which device connection establishment to be tried
